_comments: # Remove old modifier if the multiplier amount should change
# Add modifier with a multiplier based on the amount of overseers
# Keep track of multiplier amount applied so we only need to update the
# modifier if the amount is changed.

else.clear_variable: $PREV_MULT_VAR$ # No need to bloat variable list if it's 0

create_leader.name: $NAME$
create_leader.event_leader: no # Leader is allowed to lead factions and win elections

_comments: # This is a hack to make the leader not be added to player country.
# We must call ethic_leader_hire on the hire event
# We must call ethic_leader_kill on the dismiss event

hidden_effect.set_leader_flag: culled_node # This blocks paragon.600 from generated an unused node.

ruler.is_egalitarian: yes #Impossible to get, but to keep the structure

OR.has_origin: origin_shroudwalker_apprentice # This might be possible, somehow.

_comments: # Do nothing, leader matches chosen class.
